item.title: Accor Plus is the latest paid loyalty program offered by Accor
item.description: Source: Accor. Accor Advantage Plus, the paid loyalty program from Accor with more than 350,000 members in 17 countries, has been renamed and enhanced. Now known as Accor Plus, this 21-year-old program allows members to enjoy enhanced experiences at over 600 Accor properties in the Asia Pacific region. The company stated that members can benefit from substantial discounts on accommodations, dining at over 800 restaurants, and access to various VIP events and partner offers.
